shortDescription: This application is a mock coding interview platform that presents popular coding problems as realistic, scenario-based challenges, reflecting the interview style of companies like Amazon, Google, and Meta. It uses the Google Gemini API to generate the questions.

This application is a phonebook management system that allows users to store, manage, and retrieve contact information. It utilizes DynamoDB as the database to handle user and contact data efficiently and socket.io for real-time updates between the client and server.

A place to create your own social community based on your interests and location. My contributions included designing, developing, and deploying the applicationâ€™s frontend and backend using NextJS, Node.js, and Vercel, as well as modeled LLMs with a team mate.

Predict total sales for every product and store in the next month. Completed this challenge using R, leveraging data manipulation, feature engineering, and machine learning techniques to build a predictive model for sales forecasting.
An LLM model build for Club 3 App to create a social community based on your interests and location. Modeled LLMs with a team mate.
AI e-Books Customer Support is an automated chat system that leverages AI to assist users with inquiries, and recommendations related to e-books.
A customer churn prediction model analyzes historical customer behavior data to identify patterns and predict the likelihood of customers discontinuing a service or product.
